resources.string: The import file contains tasks with names that match existing task names. Overwrite the following tasks with imported tasks?
Failed to import, check the Message tab for errors.
Delete all existing tasks before import
An attempt to auto-save the synchronization task list has failed
The sync task list was automatically saved

The account name, account password or ZIP password used in the following tasks failed to import. If you auto-save the sync task and then reinstall the app, you will not be able to decrypt your account name, account password, and ZIP password. Edit the sync task to correct it to the correct value.
Protect export file with a password
Enter password for task list file.

The following data will be recorded in the log file by enabling it.\nAndroid version, Device name, Directory name, File name, SMB Account name, IP address, Network interface name, System settings, App information

Send log file by E-Mail to the developer. The log file contains Android version, Device name, Directory name, File name, SMB Account name, IP address, Network interface name, System settings and App information.
1.Press the Preview button to see the temp_log.txt, then please check the contents.(If the selection screen of the application is displayed, and then select the FAVORIT application to display the text file.)
2.When you are finished reading file to send, then select the E-Mail in EMail selection dialog.
3.Please enter a problem/question in the E-Mail body and send an E-Mail.(The log file is attached with compressed into zip and )
If you forget your password please initialize or reinstall the application.
If you forget your password, you will need to initialize or reinstall the application so please do not forget it.
Specify remote server name or IP address.
Specify port number of remote server.
Local directory name contains the %s character. Invalid character removed.
The requested operation was ignored during synchronization.
Failed to create task list file: %s
Failed to create profile. Filename %s was not found.
Canceled the sync, because Sync not String.
An error occurred while creating the SMB file list.
Filter is invalid. Source and destination directories are the same. Filter=%s
Please exclude the directory so as to access to the master and the target is different directory. Directory=%s
Please fill in the details of your problem or question about SMBSync2.
Example: The sdcard is not recognized by SMBSync2.
Problem/question is not described about SMBSync2, Do you want to send it anyway?
The app specific directory has ben selected as the storage location. This directory, and any data you have saved there, is deleted when app is uninstalled.
Disable this warning (can be enabled in user interface settings)
Warning about using the application specific directory

The following tasks from Android 8.1 sync is terminated with an error because the location service is disabled. To enable location service in system settings or change to \"Conn to any AP\", \"Private address\" or \"IP Address List\" in Sync options.

The following tasks from Android 8.1 sync is terminated with an error because \"Coarse location permission\" is not provided. Please change it to \"Conn to any AP\", \"private address\" or \"IP address List\" in the sync option either by giving permission from the menu.

The following tasks from Android 8.1 sync is terminated with an error because location services and Coarse locations are disabled. Please do one of the following.\n1.Enable location service in system settings and then give "Coarse location permission" from the app menu.\n2.Change to \"Conn to any AP\", \"Private Address\" or \"IP Address List\" in the synchronization option.
Cannot get WiFi AP name because location service is not enabled. Please enable the location in the settings.
Cannot get WiFi AP name because coarse location is not allowed. Please allow coarse location from the menu.
Cannot get WiFi AP names because the location is set to "Allow only while using the app". Change the Location to "Always Allowed" from the menu.
Disable this warning (can be enabled in sync settings)
Failed to launch activity to write permission to SDCARD.
You cannot synchronize until you are allowed to write to SDCARD.
To access the SDCARD: Tap \“SDCARD\” (1), then tap \“Select\” (2).\n \n If the "Open From" panel is not displayed, tap the menu button in the upper left corner.
To access the SDCARD: Tap \“SDCARD\” (1), then tap \“Select\” (2).\n \n If the "Open From" panel is not displayed, tap the menu button in the upper left corner.
The root directory of the SDCARD was not selected. Do you want to reselect?
Storage that can not be used by SMBSync2 has been selected. Do you want to select SDCARD instead?
You can not use SDCARD with SMBSync2 because there is no mount point. Mount point=%s
Failed to launch activity to write permission to USB media.
USB media is not mounted. Close the screen and then mount the USB media to perform the operation.
A mount point /storage/%s could not be found. SMBSync2 unable to use this USB media.
%s ｙou cannot synchronize until you are allowed to write to USB media.
To access the USB media: Tap \“USB\” (1), then tap \“Select\” (2).\n \n If the "Open From" panel is not displayed, tap the menu button in the upper left corner.
The root directory of the USB media was not selected. Do you want to reselect?
SDCARD was selected. Do you want to reselect USB storage?

If you specify \"conn to SSID\" or \"Access point list\" in the synchronization task until the permission is granted, the error terminates. To grant permission, run "Coarse location Permission" from the menu.

SMBSync2 the privileges required to read the SSID of the WiFi. \nIf you specify \"Access point list\" in the synchronization task until the permission is granted, the error terminates. \nDo you want to request a Coarse permission?
The application cannot be started because you have not been granted permission to access the internal storage.
Grant permission to access internal storage to read and write data that is synchronized to internal storage and for administrative data.
Execute all tasks configured to auto sync.
No sync tasks available for execution. Please create a sync task.
Do you want to delete all history?
Do you want to delete following history?
History log file could not be found.
You will not be able to see the details because you cannot find the application to display the text file.
Sync task has not been executed.
Duplicate directory names exist at both internal storage source and destination. Source and destination directory names must be different.
Duplicate directory names exist at both source and destination. Source and destination directory names must be different.
Duplicate directory names exist at both SDCARD source and destination. Source and destination directory names must be different.
Duplicate directory names exist at both SMB source and destination. Source and destination directory names must be different.
Specify the IP address or host name of the SMB server.
Specify the port number of the SMB server.
Specify the name of the SMB share.
Specify the SMB Host account name and password or password only.
Write to SDCARD is not allowed, edit the master folder and allow writing to SDCARD.
Write to SDCARD is not allowed, edit the target folder and allow writing to SDCARD.
Write to SDCARD is not allowed, press "Allow write to SDCARD" to allow writing to SDCARD.
Write to USB Media is not allowed, edit the master folder and allow writing to USB Media.
Write to USB Media is not allowed, edit the target folder and allow writing to USB Media.
Write to USB Media is not allowed, press "Allow write to USB Media" to allow writing to USB Media.
UBS media is not available because there is no USB media mount point.
Warning: No target directory specified for this task. Unpredictable deletes or overwrites may occur. Continue?
Sync start condition by Wireless LAN
The specified sync task will not be executed because it was ignored.
Selected task is configured for test only. No files will be copied or deleted. Execute the task?
Press add button to create new sync task.
Set the following tasks to auto
Set the following tasks to manual
If source or destination is located on SMB server. Set Wireless LAN Condition to \"Conn any AP\"?
If source or destination is located on SMB server. Set Wireless LAN Condition to \"Has private address\"?
If source and destination are not located on SMB server. Set Wireless LAN Condition to \"Off\"?
An error exists in the master folder. Please fix it.
An error exists in the target folder. Please fix it.
The account name could not be decrypted while importing the task list.Correct the correct account name.
The account password could not be decrypted while importing the task list. Correct the correct account password.
The ZIP password could not be decrypted while importing the task list. Correct the correct ZIP password.
Append time stamp to ZIP file name
Warning: The sync folder settings have changed. Exit without saving?
Directory filter has not been specified
The directory name contained Invalid characters and it was deleted (\", :, \\, *, <, > \|).
File filter has not been specified
Invalid characters (/, \", :, \\, *, <, > \|) have been removed from the file name.
Add the following keyword to directory names (The keyword is converted to the date and time that the sync was performed)
Add the following keyword to file names (The keyword is converted to the date and time that the sync was performed)
Use the photo/video shooting date and time for keyword conversions attached to the target folder directory.
Wireless LAN IP address not specified.
Wireless LAN is not connected to the specified access point.
You must specify at least one file filter option.
Min allowed time difference (in seconds) between source and destination file for synchronization
Skip task if not connected to specified access point, or if wireless LAN IP address does not match specified IP address.
Allow sync with global IP addresses
Delete files prior to sync (Mirror method only)
Files are different only when the source is larger than the destination.
Use file size to determine file difference
Use time of last update to determine file difference
File copy not performed because \"Never overwrite destination file if it is newer than the source file\" option is enabled.
Skipping directory and file names that contain invalid characters (\", :, \\, *, <, > \|)
Forced to get the last update date and time in SMBSync2
Sync files located in root of source directory.
Do not overwrite destination file if newer than source file
Ignore Day Light Saving Time difference between files
Time difference between daylight saving time and standard time(Minutes)
Do not set update time of destination file to match source file
Execute sync tasks only when charging
Test mode (do not copy or delete files)
Write files directly to the SMB folder without using temporary files
Directory filter has not been specified.
(Sync type only moves) Delete the master directory when the master directory is empty.
Limit SMB I/O write buffer to 16 KB
Keep a two-way sync conflict file
Failed to save task list file: %s
Could not get the list of SMB shares. Please check below.\n -Shared on the SMB server side\n -Specify account/password if you do not specify an account/password
The sync task list cannot be saved because the internal encryption key is invalid. \nRecreate internal encryption key?
External storage was not mounted. Some functions are not available.
Application was restarted after being killed. To disable restart, enable \"Don\'t keep activities\" in Settings > Developer Options.
Application was restarted because it was killed when it moved to the background.
The parameters of SMBv1 has been changed. This change will not be effective until the application is restarted. Exit this application now?
Please specify a name for the task
No sync tasks can be executed while management file maintenance is running. Run management file maintenance?
Unable to perform management file maintenance while sync task is running.
Management file maintenance has been canceled.
%s items deleted from the last modified time list.
%s history log files have been deleted.
Files and directories not related to history logs have been found in the history log directory. Remove these files?

The image capture time and date cannot be obtained from EXIF data. Use file update time and date instead? (Disable the \"Confirm\" archiving option for this sync task to avoid this message in the future)
Confirm overwrite of file \n%s\n(Disable the \"Confirm before overwrite/delete\" option for this sync task to avoid this message in the future)
Confirm delete directory \n%s\n(Disable the \"Confirm before overwrite/delete\" option for this sync task to avoid this message in the future)
Confirm deletion of file \n%s\n(Disable the \"Confirm before overwrite/delete\" option for this sync task to avoid this message in the future)
Confirm moving of file \n%s\n(Disable the \"Confirm before overwrite/delete\" option for this sync task to avoid this message in the future)
Tap here to confirm archiving file.
Tap here to confirm overwrite of file.
Tap here to confirm directory delete.
Tap here to confirm file delete.
Tap here to confirm file move.
The last modified time of the file was used because the shooting date and time cannot be obtained from the EXIF/metadata of the file. File=
The last modified time of the file was used because an error occurred in the conversion of the shooting date. File=
Sync aborted because a directory with the same name as the file exists in the target. File=
Synchronization was canceled because the length of the file name exceeds 255 bytes. File name byte count=%s, File name=%s
Sync cancelled because SDCARD is not mounted.
Sync cancelled because SDCARD write permission not granted.
It seems that the SDCARD contents is not reflected in the media store. Execute media scan to update the contents of the SDCARD.
setLastModified() failed. Enable \"Do not set the update time of the destination file to match the source file\" for the sync task.
Copying the ZIP file to the target file... %s%% done.
Copying the ZIP file to the work file... %s%% done.
File copy ignored because the \"Overwrite destination file(s)\" option is disabled for this task.
File move ignored because the \"Overwrite destination file(s)\" option is disabled for this task.
The source file or directory name contains characters that are not valid for the destination. Edit name to allow sync. Character: %s, Path: %s
File or directory excluded from sync process because source name contains characters not valid for the destination. Character: %s, Path: %s
Unable to connect to SMB host address %s
Unable to connect to SMB host %s on port %s
The SMB host name could not be found, try it with an IP address. Host Name=
Directory ignored because the same directory cannot be synchronized. Directory=%s
Unable to connect to the specified SMB server. IP address=%s
Unable to connect to the specified SMB server. IP address=%s, port=%s
The specified SMB server host name could not be found. Host name=
Sync aborted. Wireless adapter does not have specified IP address.
Sync aborted. Not connected to specified wireless access point.
Sync aborted. Not connected to WiFi access point.
Sync aborted. Network address is not a local address.
Sync aborted. Wireless LAN is off.
Sync aborted. Network address can not obtained.
The network address is a global IP address(%s) and the sync is aborted. If you want to sync, enable the global IP address with the sync option.
Sync request has been started. Requestor=%s
Sync task skipped because wireless LAN address does not match specified IP address
Sync task skipped because wireless LAN not connected to specified WiFi access point
In order to the wireless LAN is a delay time after ON has been specified, it delays the start of the sync %s seconds.
Source file or directory not found.
# of copies=%s, # of deletes=%s, # of ignores=%s, Elapsed time=%s
# of copies=%s, # of deletes=%s, # of ignores=%s, # of warnings=%s, # of retries=%s, # of errors=%s
Sync cancelled because USB media is not mounted.
Specify IP address range, then press the Search button
Select host name or IP address from search results
Begin address is greater than end address.
Turn on Wi-Fi when Wi-Fi is off at the start of sync.
Delay period before sync after WiFi enable
If you turn on Wi-Fi at the start of sync, turn off Wi-Fi after the end of sync.
It will make the first sync with the next minute.
Sync on the last day of every month

Warning: Months that have less than 29 days may not trigger execution of tasks when 29th - 31st is specified. Enable the \"Sync on the last day of the month\" option to ensure task is executed on the last day of every month.
Please specify the profile to be sync by pressing the ‘Edit sync list’ button in the .
The task specified in the schedule cannot be found. Schedule:%s, Task:%s
Specified sync task name was not found, Name=(%s)
Sync task was already deleted or renamed.
Please select at least one day of the week.
That sync task name already exists. Use a different name.
Do you want to delete the following item(s)? The results are immediately reflected and cannot be undone.
Do you want to enable the following item(s)? The results are immediately reflected and cannot be undone.
Do you want to disable the following item(s)? The results are immediately reflected and cannot be undone.
Change the schedule name. The results are immediately reflected and cannot be undone.
The schedule has changed. Exit without saving?
Press add button to create new schedule.
Schedule sync is not performed because the schedule is disabled. To perform scheduling sync, tap the schedule icon at the top of the screen to enable it.
Do you want to enable the schedule?
Do you want to disable the schedule?
Toggle Enable or disable the schedule.
Schedules and WiFi options for multiple tasks will be consolidated to prevent duplicate sync processes.

Send LogCat and AppLog to developers by e-mail
 1. Please check the contents by pressing the LogCat display button and AppLog display button (choose an application when the application selection screen is displayed).
 2. After confirming the contents to be sent, press the send button and select email in the email selection dialog.
 3. Please enter a message in the body of email if necessary then send the email (the log is compressed to zip and attached to the email).
Because sync task is disabled, it was unable to start the sync task.
Sync request received from the SMBSync2 scheduler.
Sync request received from the SMBSync2 scheduler, but it was ignored because this task does not exist:
Execution aborted because the sync task does not exist.
Sync request received from an external application.
Sync request received from an external application, but it has been ignored because the specified sync task does not exist:
Execution aborted because the sync task does not exist.
Execution aborted because no sync task has been specified.
Automatic sync task has been started because no sync task specified.
Sync request received from the shortcut.
Sync request ignored because it has already been processed. ID=%s
Sync task was ignored because Sync task was in error. Task=%s, Requestor=%s
Sync task was ignored because Sync task was already queued. Task=%s, Requestor=%s
Sync task was ignored because Sync task was already queued. Schedule=%s, Task=%s, Requestor=%s
Start sync task request accepted. Task=%s, Requestor=%s
Start sync task request accepted. Schedule=%s, Task=%s, Requestor=%s
The following sync request was ignored because the previous sync was an error or canceled.
Saved files and directories (indicated date/time is not the date/time of image capture)
Change the file name and store it in the specified directory when archive
Create a directory based on the date taken when archiving and store the file.
If the date and time cannot be determined by EXIF data, a confirmation message is displayed.
ZIP files cannot be used as destinations for Archive sync type. Internal storage will be used instead.
Record app and task events in a log file
Send event messages to Android Logcat

Perform application password authentication when \"Launch application\"
Perform application password authentication when \"Erdit task\"
Perform application password authentication when \"Export task list\"
Hide the saved account name and password When editing the SMB folder
Set the validity time of password authentication to 30 minutes
If you start syncing when the screen is lit, the screen will be lit until the end of synchronization.
Kill app process after app cleanup
The screen lights up when the sync starts and wakes up
Prevent delay of start sync during sleep
Do Not Compress These File Types

string-array.name: settings_notification_message_when_sync_ended_list_entries
string-array.item: Only show notifications for tasks that complete successfully
Only show notifications for tasks that complete with errors

resources.string: Only show notifications for tasks that complete with errors
Only show notifications for tasks that complete successfully
The default notification sound has not been set.

string-array.name: settings_playback_ringtone_when_sync_ended_list_entries
string-array.item: Play default notification sound for all completed tasks
Play default notification sound for tasks that complete successfully
Play default notification sound for tasks that complete with errors

resources.string: Play default notification sound for all completed tasks
Play default notification sound for tasks that complete with errors
Play default notification sound for tasks that complete successfully
Disable warning when app specific directory is included in sync task
Do Not Warn When Syncing App Specific Directory
Disable warning for location service enabling.
Do not warn when location service disabled.

string-array.name: settings_vibrate_when_sync_ended_list_entries
string-array.item: Enable notification vibration for all completed tasks
Enable notification vibration for tasks that complete successfully
Enable notification vibration for tasks that complete with errors

resources.string: Enable notification vibration for all completed tasks
Enable notification vibration for tasks that complete with errors
Enable notification vibration for tasks that complete successfully
To keep the Wi-Fi radio awake until sync completed
